channel.title: Very basic [508] help
channel.description:
[code]// ID LV HP MH AT WN SD AE BE DE AD NN ND[/code]
In Npclist.cfg just wondering what each of these actually mean I understand some of them ID: npcid, lV:npclvl, HP:npchp the others all the way to nn & nd which I'm assuming is name & description(examine)
Anyone want to tell me the meanings of these remaining
[code]MH AT WN SD AE BE DE AD[/code]
Thanks guys

item.title: Very basic [508] help
